label: Gothic English
notes: English Gothic tracery, lancet arches, choir gold/blue.

label: Mesoamerican (Maya/Aztec PD)
notes: Step‑fret, serpent motifs; use public‑domain codex forms only.

label: East Asian (PD)
notes: Cloud scrolls, ink wash sensibility; five‑note scale feel.

label: Druidic/Celtic (Insular PD)
notes: Knotwork, triskele, oak/rowan; Insular manuscript geometry.

label: Hathoric/Egyptian (PD)
notes: Papyrus bundle, sistrum, Hathor crown; PD relief patterns.
